words.prompt: An ________ is something that you worked hard to finish or learn.
If you ________, you said you were sorry.
When you give something your ________, you watch, listen, or concentrate on it.
An ________ is a group of people gathered to hear or see something.
When you have ________, you have trust or faith in something or someone.
When you feel ________, you feel shy, uncomfortable, or ashamed.
If you ________ something, you became fully aware of it.
________ are natural abilities or skills.
To________ is to give a warning or signal.
A ________ is a situation in which people or animals are trying to be more successful than others.
An ________ is the place that surrounds a living thing and affects its survival.
Something that is ________ is very good.
To ________ is to like something better than another thing.
________ is when something is kept safe.
To be________ is to belong to the same family.
________ is something that protects or covers something else.
________ means willing to risk danger in order to have exciting or unusual experiences.
________ means very brave.
________ means the same as “very.”
________means strange or unusual.
________ is a form of poetry that does not have a regular pattern of rhyme and rhythm.
A ________ is a poem that tells a story.
________ means that words or phrases in a poem are repeated for effect.
To ________ means to end with the same sound
